instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: اما روز هفتمین سبت یهوه خدای توست، درآن هیچکاری مکن، تو و پسرت و دخترت وغلامت و کنیزت و گاوت و الاغت و همه بهایمت و مهمانت که در اندرون دروازه های تو باشد، تاغلامت و کنیزت مثل تو آرام گیرند.
output: Thou shalt not make thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing that is in heaven above, or that is in the earth beneath, or that is in the waters beneath the earth:

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و ظرف سفالین که صاحب جریان آن را لمس نماید، شکسته شود، و هر ظرف چوبین به آب شسته شود.
output: And if he that hath the issue spit upon him that is clean; then he shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: مهر و پیشکش هر قدرزیاده از من بخواهید، آنچه بگویید، خواهم دادفقط دختر را به زنی به من بسپارید.»
output: And ye shall dwell with us: and the land shall be before you; dwell and trade ye therein, and get you possessions therein.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و ابراهیم، دست خودرا دراز کرده، کارد را گرفت، تا پسر خویش را ذبح نماید.
output: And Abraham said, My son, God will provide himself a lamb for a burnt offering: so they went both of them together.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و خداوند بخاطر شما برمن نیزخشم نموده، گفت که «تو هم داخل آنجا نخواهی شد.
output: And in the wilderness, where thou hast seen how that the LORD thy God bare thee, as a man doth bear his son, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: وبنی ماکیر بن منسی به جلعاد رفته، آن را گرفتند واموریان را که در آن بودند، اخراج نمودند.
output: And the children of Gad built Dibon, and Ataroth, and Aroer,

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: از سی ساله و بالاتر تاپنجاه ساله هرکه به خدمت داخل شود، تا کارخیمه اجتماع را بنماید. ایشان را بشمار.
output: And they shall bear the curtains of the tabernacle, and the tabernacle of the congregation, his covering, and the covering of the badgers' skins that is above upon it, and the hanging for the door of the tabernacle of the congregation,

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و پایه های ستونها از برنج بود، و قلابها وپشت بندهای ستونها از نقره، و پوشش سرهای آنها از نقره، و جمیع ستونهای صحن به پشت بندهای نقره پیوسته شده بود.
output: The hangings of the one side of the gate were fifteen cubits; their pillars three, and their sockets three.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: عورت عروس خود را کشف مکن، او زن پسرتو است. عورت او را کشف مکن.
output: The nakedness of thy father's wife's daughter, begotten of thy father, she is thy sister, thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و از دان، اخیعزر بن عمیشدای.
output: Of Judah; Nahshon the son of Amminadab.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و او را به حضورالعازار کاهن و به حضور تمامی جماعت برپاداشته، در نظر ایشان به وی وصیت نما.
output: For ye rebelled against my commandment in the desert of Zin, in the strife of the congregation, to sanctify me at the water before their eyes: that is the water of Meribah in Kadesh in the wilderness of Zin.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و در فردای آن روز چون موسی به خیمه شهادت داخل شد، اینک عصای هارون که بجهت خاندان لاوی بودشکفته بود، و شکوفه آورده و گل داده، و بادام رسانیده بود.
output: And thou shalt write Aaron's name upon the rod of Levi: for one rod shall be for the head of the house of their fathers.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: پس برگشته، از راه باشان برآمدند. و عوج ملک باشان با تمامی قوم خود به مقابله ایشان ازبرای جنگ به ادرعی بیرون آمد.
output: For there is a fire gone out of Heshbon, a flame from the city of Sihon: it hath consumed Ar of Moab, and the lords of the high places of Arnon.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: چون گناهی که کرده است بر او معلوم شود، آنگاه بز نر بی‌عیب برای قربانی خود بیاورد.
output: And he shall take all his fat from him, and burn it upon the altar.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: پس قوم، یعنی تمامی لشکر که به طرف شمالی شهر بودند و آنانی را که به طرف غربی شهر در کمین بودند قرار دادند، و یوشع آن شب در میان وادی رفت.
output: (For they will come out after us) till we have drawn them from the city; for they will say, They flee before us, as at the first: therefore we will flee before them.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و درمیان ایشان کسی نبود از آنانی که موسی و هارون کاهن، شمرده بودند وقتی که بنی‌اسرائیل را دربیابان سینا شمردند.زیرا خداوند درباره ایشان گفته بود که البته در بیابان خواهند مرد، پس از آنهایک مرد سوای کالیب بن یفنه و یوشع بن نون باقی نماند.
output: And the name of Amram's wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, whom her mother bare to Levi in Egypt: and she bare unto Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و از سبط نفتالی قادش رادر جلیل که شهر ملجای قاتلان است با نواحی آن و حموت دور را با نواحی آن و قرتان را، یعنی سه شهر دادند.
output: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh, Tanach with her suburbs, and Gath-rimmon with her suburbs; two cities.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و کاهن قدری از روغن را به کف دست چپ خود بریزد.
output: And two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, such as he is able to get; and the one shall be a sin offering, and the other a burnt offering.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: هفت روز هدیه آتشین برای خداوند بگذرانید، و در روز هفتم، محفل مقدس باشد؛ هیچ کار ازشغل مکنید.»
output: These are the feasts of the LORD, even holy convocations, which ye shall proclaim in their seasons.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و خداوند گفت: «اینک مقامی نزد من است. پس بر صخره بایست.
output: And he said, I beseech thee, shew me thy glory.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: مبادا فاسد شوید و برای خود صورت تراشیده، یا تمثال هر شکلی از شبیه ذکور یا اناث بسازید.
output: Specially the day that thou stoodest before the LORD thy God in Horeb, when the LORD said unto me, Gather me the people together, and I will make them hear my words, that they may learn to fear me all the days that they shall live upon the earth, and that they may teach their children.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و عورت خواهر مادرت یا خواهر پدرت راکشف مکن؛ آن کس خویش خود را عریان ساخته است. ایشان متحمل گناه خود خواهند بود.
output: And if a man lie with a beast, he shall surely be put to death: and ye shall slay the beast.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: پس آن را شناخته، گفت: «ردای پسر من است! جانوری درنده او را خورده است، و یقین یوسف دریده شده است.»
output: And they took Joseph's coat, and killed a kid of the goats, and dipped the coat in the blood;

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و حایض درحیضش و هر‌که جریان دارد خواه مرد خواه زن، و مردی که با زن نجس همبستر شود.
output: And on the eighth day she shall take unto her two turtles, or two young pigeons, and bring them unto the priest, to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و روغن مسح مقدس و بخور معطر طاهر را از صنعت عطارساخت.
output: And he overlaid it with pure gold, both the top of it, and the sides thereof round about, and the horns of it: also he made unto it a crown of gold round about.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: از قسمت ایشان بگیر و به العازار کاهن بده تا هدیه افراشتنی برای خداوند باشد.
output: And ye shall wash your clothes on the seventh day, and ye shall be clean, and afterward ye shall come into the camp.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و آنچه را که بیضه آن کوفته یافشرده یا شکسته یا بریده باشد، برای خداوندنزدیک میاورید، و در زمین خود قربانی مگذرانید.
output: But whatsoever hath a blemish, that shall ye not offer: for it shall not be acceptable for you.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و من دل فرعون را سخت می‌کنم، و آیات وعلامات خود را در زمین مصر بسیار می‌سازم.
output: And Moses said before the LORD, Behold, I am of uncircumcised lips, and how shall Pharaoh hearken unto me?

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و خداوند به موسی گفت: «نزد فرعون برو زیرا که من دل فرعون و دل بندگانش را سخت کرده‌ام، تا این آیات خود را درمیان ایشان ظاهر سازم.
output: And Moses went out of the city from Pharaoh, and spread abroad his hands unto the LORD: and the thunders and hail ceased, and the rain was not poured upon the earth.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و بنی بنیامین یبوسیان را که در اورشلیم ساکن بودند بیرون نکردند، و یبوسیان بابنی بنیامین تا امروز در اورشلیم ساکنند.
output: And Othniel the son of Kenaz, Caleb's younger brother, took it: and he gave him Achsah his daughter to wife.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و آن از آن هارون و پسرانش از جانب بنی‌اسرائیل به فریضه ابدی خواهد بود، زیرا که هدیه رفیعه است و هدیه رفیعه از جانب بنی‌اسرائیل از قربانی های سلامتی ایشان برای خداوند خواهد بود.
output: And thou shalt receive them of their hands, and burn them upon the altar for a burnt offering, for a sweet savour before the LORD: it is an offering made by fire unto the LORD.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و بیت عربه و صمارایم و بیت ئیل.
output: And the south quarter was from the end of Kirjath-jearim, and the border went out on the west, and went out to the well of waters of Nephtoah:

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: زیراوقتی که شما از مصر بیرون آمدید، شما را در راه به نان و آب استقبال نکردند، و از این جهت که بلعام بن بعور را از فتور ارام نهرین اجیر کردند تا تو را لعنت کند.
output: If a man find a damsel that is a virgin, which is not betrothed, and lay hold on her, and lie with her, and they be found;

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و التولد و بتول و حرمه.
output: Gibeon, and Ramah, and Beeroth,

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: آنگاه موی خود را بتراشد لیکن سعفه را نتراشد و کاهن آن مبتلای سعفه را بازهفت روز نگاه دارد.
output: If a man or woman have a plague upon the head or the beard;

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: پس کاهن ملاحظه نماید اگر برص تمام بدن را فروگرفته است، به تطهیر آن مبتلا حکم دهد. چونکه همه بدنش سفید شده است، طاهر است.
output: When the plague of leprosy is in a man, then he shall be brought unto the priest;

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و به من گفت: هر آینه من تو را بارور و کثیرگردانم، و از تو قومهای بسیار بوجود آورم، و این زمین را بعد از تو به ذریت تو، به میراث ابدی خواهم داد.
output: And one told Jacob, and said, Behold, thy son Joseph cometh unto thee: and Israel strengthened himself, and sat upon the bed.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و تو را مکانی بیرون از اردو باشد تا به آنجابیرون روی.
output: Thou shalt not seek their peace nor their prosperity all thy days for ever.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: ونزدیک به وقت بستن دروازه، آن مردان در تاریکی بیرون رفتند و نمی دانم که ایشان کجا رفتند. به زودی ایشان را تعاقب نمایید که به ایشان خواهیدرسید.»
output: And they answered Joshua, saying, All that thou commandest us we will do, and whithersoever thou sendest us, we will go.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: اینک این طوایف را که باقی‌مانده‌اند ازاردن و جمیع طوایف را که مغلوب ساخته‌ام تادریای بزرگ، به سمت مغرب آفتاب برای شما به قرعه تقسیم کرده‌ام تا میراث اسباط شما باشند.
output: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest said unto the children of Reuben, and to the children of Gad, and to the children of Manasseh, This day we perceive that the LORD is among us, because ye have not committed this trespass against the LORD: now ye have delivered the children of Israel out of the hand of the LORD.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و مرد برای قربانی جرم خود قوچ قربانی جرم را نزد خداوند به در خیمه اجتماع بیاورد.
output: Thou shalt not hate thy brother in thine heart: thou shalt in any wise rebuke thy neighbour, and not suffer sin upon him.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و چون صبح روشن شد، آن مردان را باحماران ایشان، روانه کردند.
output: And he commanded the steward of his house, saying, Fill the men's sacks with food, as much as they can carry, and put every man's money in his sack's mouth.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و کنیز او که رومه نام داشت، او نیز طابح و جاحم و تاحش ومعکه را زایید.
output: And Chesed, and Hazo, and Pildash, and Jidlaph, and Bethuel.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و موسی هارون وپسرانش العازار و ایتامار را گفت: «مویهای سرخود را باز مکنید و گریبان خود را چاک مزنیدمبادا بمیرید. و غضب بر تمامی جماعت بشود. اما برادران شما یعنی تمام خاندان اسرائیل بجهت آتشی که خداوند افروخته است ماتم خواهند کرد.
output: And there went out fire from the LORD, and devoured them, and they died before the LORD.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: کیست که غبار یعقوب را تواند شمرد یا ربع اسرائیل را حساب نماید؟ کاش که من به وفات عادلان بمیرم و عاقبت من مثل عاقبت ایشان باشد.»
output: And the LORD put a word in Balaam's mouth, and said, Return unto Balak, and thus thou shalt speak.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و یرموت را با نواحی آن و عین جنیم را بانواحی آن، یعنی چهار شهر.
output: And Kibzaim with her suburbs, and Beth-horon with her suburbs; four cities.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: تو را وزن صحیح وراست باشد و تو را کیل صحیح و راست باشد، تاعمرت در زمینی که یهوه، خدایت، به تومی دهد دراز شود.
output: Then shall his brother's wife come unto him in the presence of the elders, and loose his shoe from off his foot, and spit in his face, and shall answer and say, So shall it be done unto that man that will not build up his brother's house.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: «بنی‌اسرائیل را خطاب کرده، به ایشان بگو: چون به زمینی که من شما را در آن درمی آورم داخل شوید،
output: All that are born of the country shall do these things after this manner, in offering an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و اینک اسباب حرف بدو نسبت داده، می‌گوید دختر تو را باکره نیافتم، و علامت بکارت دختر من این است.» پس جامه را پیش مشایخ شهر بگسترانند.
output: Thou shalt not wear a garment of divers sorts, as of woollen and linen together.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و آن مرد به زمین حتیان رفته، شهری بنا نمود و آن را لوز نامید که تا امروزاسمش همان است.
output: Also Judah took Gaza with the coast thereof, and Askelon with the coast thereof, and Ekron with the coast thereof.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و نیز گویید: اینک بنده ات، یعقوب درعقب ماست.» زیرا گفت: «غضب او را بدین ارمغانی که پیش من می‌رود، فرو خواهم نشانید، وبعد چون روی او را بینم، شاید مرا قبول فرماید.»
output: Then thou shalt say, They be thy servant Jacob's; it is a present sent unto my lord Esau: and, behold, also he is behind us.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: ‌ای خداوند قوم خوداسرائیل را که فدیه داده‌ای بیامرز، و مگذار که خون بی‌گناه در میان قوم تو اسرائیل بماند.» پس خون برای ایشان عفو خواهد شد.
output: Then thy elders and thy judges shall come forth, and they shall measure unto the cities which are round about him that is slain:

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و سرور خاندان آبای جرشونیان، الیاساف بن لایل باشد.
output: And the sons of Kohath by their families; Amram, and Izehar, Hebron, and Uzziel.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: آنگاه خداوند به موسی گفت: «همانا من نان از آسمان برای شما بارانم، و قوم رفته، کفایت هرروز را در روزش گیرند، تا ایشان را امتحان کنم که بر شریعت من رفتار می‌کنند یا نه.
output: And they took their journey from Elim, and all the congregation of the children of Israel came unto the wilderness of Sin, which is between Elim and Sinai, on the fifteenth day of the second month after their departing out of the land of Egypt.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و چراغدان طاهر و چراغهایش، چراغهای آراسته شده و همه اسبابش، و روغن برای روشنایی.
output: And the covering of rams' skins dyed red, and the covering of badgers' skins, and the vail of the covering,

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: پس موسی به هارون گفت: «ظرفی بگیر، وعومری پر از من در آن بنه و آن را به حضورخداوند بگذار، تا در نسلهای شما نگاه داشته شود.»
output: So the people rested on the seventh day.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: ‌ای امتها با قوم او آواز شادمانی دهید. زیراانتقام خون بندگان خود را گرفته است. و ازدشمنان خود انتقام کشیده و برای زمین خود وقوم خویش کفاره نموده است.
output: And he shall say, Where are their gods, their rock in whom they trusted,

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و به نام من قسم دروغ مخورید، که نام خدای خود را بی‌حرمت نموده باشی، من یهوه هستم.
output: Therefore every one that eateth it shall bear his iniquity, because he hath profaned the hallowed thing of the LORD: and that soul shall be cut off from among his people.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: پس موسی برحسب قول خداوند چنانکه مامور شد، ایشان را شمرد.
output: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و اگر او را بادست خود به سنگی که از آن کسی کشته شود، بزند تا بمیرد، او قاتل است و قاتل البته کشته شود.
output: And they shall be unto you cities for refuge from the avenger; that the manslayer die not, until he stand before the congregation in judgment.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و تمامی جماعت بنی‌اسرائیل در آن صحرا برموسی و هارون شکایت کردند.
output: And said, If thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of the LORD thy God, and wilt do that which is right in his sight, and wilt give ear to his commandments, and keep all his statutes, I will put none of these diseases upon thee, which I have brought upon the Egyptians: for I am the LORD that healeth thee.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و دست خود را بر سر بز بنهد وآن را در جایی که قربانی سوختنی را ذبح کنند به حضور خداوند ذبح نماید. این قربانی گناه است.
output: And he shall do with the bullock as he did with the bullock for a sin offering, so shall he do with this: and the priest shall make an atonement for them, and it shall be forgiven them.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: «پس جمیع فرایض مرا و جمیع احکام مرانگاه داشته، آنها را بجا آورید، تا زمینی که من شمارا به آنجا می‌آورم تا در آن ساکن شوید، شما راقی نکند.
output: And if a man shall lie with a woman having her sickness, and shall uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them shall be cut off from among their people.

instruction: In this task, you are given a sentence from the Bible in Persian, and your task is to translate it into English.
input: و میوه بطن خود، یعنی گوشت پسران ودخترانت را که یهوه خدایت به تو می‌دهد درمحاصره و تنگی که دشمنانت تو را به آن زبون خواهند ساخت، خواهی خورد.
output: Because thou servedst not the LORD thy God with joyfulness, and with gladness of heart, for the abundance of all things;
